titles.title: I Was Made To Praise You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I was made to praise You.
I was made to glorify Your name,
In every circumstance, to find a chance to thank You.
I was made to love You.
I was made to worship at Your feet,
And to obey You, Lord.
I was made for You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will always praise You.
I will always glorify Your name.
In every circumstance, I'll find a chance to thank You.
I will always love You.
I will always worship at Your feet,
And I'll obey You, Lord.
I was made for You.
